value.name: Kenneth Jones in court Thursday
value.description: The man who pleaded guilty to manslaughter in the death of Stephanie Eldredge is back in court Thursday. Kenneth Jones is asking to either correct what he believes to be an illegal sentence or reduce his sentence claiming its excessive or unduly harsh.

video.name: Kenneth Jones in court Thursday - Local News 8

value.name: 'He was human': Family of Kenneth Jones speaks out
value.description: The sister of Kenneth Jones said she wants more transparency from police following her brother's death. Jones died when an Omaha Police Officer shot him during a traffic stop in November 2020.
